Articles.Content: I'm deciding to get a Xbox 1. I have a 360. A lot of games on it. And a train game (train frontier express) and judging by my name, title, sig.... I like trains. What should I do with it?
I think the Xbox One has backwards compatibility, so sell the old one and buy the Xbox One.

I think the Xbox One has backwards compatibility, so sell the old one and buy the Xbox One.

I think so too, so I would go with that if you really want a console instead of upgrading a pc or something

It is only backwards compatable for certain games is what I heard.

I would hold on to your 360. I have a box in my closet with my NES, SNES, N64, PS2, and my 360. my PS4 now takes the front and center role, but you never know when you will get the itch to play an older classic.
